text: @Yamiche pathetic, partisan hack @PBS @NewsHour White House correspondent, @NBCNews & @MSNBC contributor, formerly of @NYTimes & @USATODAY , begins today's virtue signaling as the U.S. death toll from the coronavirus nears 100,000.
